overview: Young San Francisco ride share driver Guillaume tells all of his passengers that he is homesick for France, but realized he was afraid of flying and feels he cannot return. One passenger, a beautiful woman named Amy, feels bad for Guillaume and offers to become his friend. Soon the two are having an affair and Guillaume, Amy and her boyfriend Mike become entangled in a quarter life crisis. As the three try to figure out what it is they want in life, they are interrupted by a series of strange occurrences that make coming to a decision even harder.
title: The Driver
